title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Vikings HC Kevin O’Connell on McVay Influence, Cousins Connection
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Vikings HC Kevin O’Connell on McVay Influence, Cousins Connection
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains if it’s a good thing Kevin Durant has walked back his trade request to return to the Nets, and if Nick Saban massive $12 million per year extension is overpaid.

Then, first year Vikings HC Kevin O’Connell joins Colin to discuss how he was introduced to Sean McVay (10:00), why it’s important for him to connect with Kirk Cousins (21:00), how working under McVay influenced his offensive philosophy (25:00), scouting reports for QB’s he’s played and coached with (29:00), how he can help Cousins continue to improve (31:00), and the most important trait for NFL franchise QB’s (38:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd   

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
